title: AWS Lambda Function URL to Amazon DynamoDB
description: Create a Lambda function with a Lambda Function URL that recieves a payload and inserts a record into a DynamoDB table.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: When an HTTP `POST` request is sent to the Lambda Function URL endpoint, the AWS Lambda function is invoked and inserts an item into the Amazon DynamoDB table.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

author.headline: Presented by Abhishek Gupta, Principal Developer Advocate at AWS
author.name: Abhishek Gupta
